alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 01 at 2:04AM PDT until April 01 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Eastern Modoc County, including portions of Highway 299. In Oregon, Eastern Lake County including portions of Highway 140, Highway 395 and Highway 31 including Summer Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur from 5 AM to 5 PM. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
